name: Syberia: The World Before - Collector's Edition
summary:
Syberia: The World Before Collector’s Edition will include:
- Full Game
- Metal Case
- Adjustable Figurine of Kate & Dana
- Artbook
- Music Box
- Map of Vaghen
- Exclusive Lithography
- Keychain
- Set of Postcards
- Digital Script of the Prologue
- Digital Soundtrack
- Collector’s Box
